_header: I have forgive thee all thing
_description: English verses in a story from the Gesta Romanorum — two couplets separated by Latin prose in a sermon, ‘Venit’ (p. 258)

CamCCC423.Transcription:
I haue for yef the all thyngTake no more to euell lyuyngWhat
                    haue I doo for theHowe mych and whi take hede and see
